name: frontend-scalingo
description: Empty package.json to allow scalingo nodejs buildpack to setup properly

scripts.build: (cd front; npm install; npm run build)
scripts.generate-schema-ts: npm run generate-schema && cd front && npm run generate-api
scripts.generate-and-check-types: npm run generate-schema && cd front && npm run generate-and-check-types
scripts.migrate: python web/manage.py makemigrations && python web/manage.py migrate
